treatment.description: Herbage glabrous. Flowers usually 5-merous (4 in L. macounii); sepals not accrescent; petals flexed outward (reflexed) as fruits mature, white, bright to pale yellow, or yellow with white tips, veins translucent, purplish, pink, rose, white, or cream, sometimes aging or drying lilac, pink, chartreuse, or pale yellow, longer than sepals, with marginal hairs basally.

references.reference: Kesseli, R. V. and S. K. Jain. 1984b. New variation and biosystematic patterns detected by allozyme and morphological comparison in Limnanthes sect. Reflexae (Limnanthaceae). Pl. Syst. Evol. 147: 133–164.

key_statement.statement: Sepals 4; petals 4; stems decumbent (sometimes upcurved apically)
Sepals 5; petals 5; stems erect or ascending.
Leaflet blade margins usually toothed or lobed, sometimes entire; sepals 4–10 mm
Leaflet blade margins usually entire (rarely 2- or 3-lobed); sepals 5–7 mm.
